sn55.9:1.1: Ekamantam nisinno kho ayasma anando bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn55.9:2.1: “Asoko, ananda, bhikkhu kalankato asavanam khaya anasavam cetovimuttim pannavimuttim dittheva dhamme sayam abhinna sacchikatva upasampajja vihasi …pe…
sn55.9:3.1: Ayam kho so, ananda, dhammadaso dhammapariyayo;
sn55.9:3.2: yena samannagato ariyasavako akankhamano attanava attanam byakareyya:
sn55.9:3.3: ‘khinanirayomhi khinatiracchanayoni khinapettivisayo khinapayaduggativinipato, sotapannohamasmi avinipatadhammo niyato sambodhiparayano’”ti.
